Name: Valence Security
Author: Valence Security - info@valencesecurity.com
Description: [Valence Security](https://valencesecurity.com/) SaaS security platform: Valence is the first SaaS security company to combine SSPM and advanced remediation with business user collaboration to find and fix SaaS security risks. SaaS applications are becoming decentrally managed and more complex, which is introducing misconfiguration, identity, data, and SaaS-to-SaaS integration risks. The Valence SaaS Security Platform provides visibility and remediation capabilities for business-critical SaaS applications such as Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, Salesforce, GitHub and Slack. With Valence, security teams can empower their business to securely adopt SaaS.
WorkbookBladeDescription: This Solution installs a workbook for Valence Security SaaS security platform. You can use this workbook to view and analyze alerts raised by Valence. The following workbook elements are included: 1. Alerts count by severity, over the past 30 days, 2. Alerts count by day over the past week.
